name: Re:Joyce
description:
"Close your eyes. Can you see the door?"

In this short story-driven VR game, you get a look through the inner eyes of Joyce, a woman trying to untangle the difficult relationship with her father, by going through the memories of her teenage bedroom and reconnect with her past. 

This project is a collaboration by students at Kristiania University College in Oslo studying Screenwriting, Game Design, 3D and Sound Design. It started out as a prototype for a 4 week Virtual Reality course, and ended up as the beautiful and emotional game you now can download and experience for yourself.

Estimated playtime: 15-20 minutes
